title: First blood (Captioned)
creator_credit: Orion Pictures Corporation, Buzz Feitshans and Ted Kotcheff
brief_description: His body and mind were brutally scarred from Vietnam. Then the small-town cop threatened him, abused and caged him like a wild animal - not like the hero he really was. They finally pushed him too far and all hell broke loose as he declared his own war against them. Rated: M Caption Version only Available.
